Overthrows are officially defined for the first time.

Gaddafi's son was once considered a successor to his father's regime and faced charges from the ICC.

title: Inside China’s gray zone activities: How Beijing is salami slicing its way to influence
description: China is employing a 'salami slicing' strategy, taking incremental steps across military, economic, and technological domains to alter realities without triggering conflict. This 'gray zone' approach, evident in the South China Sea and beyond, bypasses international law and exploits rivals' hesitation. The cumulative effect creates new facts on the ground, challenging the existing order.

title: Indian scientists make affordable dipstick test to track AMR in sewage

title: Oracle clarifies deal amid reports it may trigger layoffs of up to 30,000 employees

However, the company's significant debt and market cap decline have raised investor concerns, highlighting the immense capital demands of the AI boom.
